about_the_game:
Prepare for intense action in "Ninja Monkey," where you take control of an agile ninja monkey in an epic battle against swarms of deadly bees! This thrilling roguelike platformer takes you on a journey of survival, strategy, and ninja skills, where every decision counts.

Key Features


⚔️ Frenetic Battles:

Face relentless waves of fierce bees in a stunning sidescroll platform setting. Survive each round and choose from three exclusive upgrades to strengthen your ninja monkey and prepare for the next challenges.



💥 Challenge Bosses:

Test your skills against formidable bosses that require advanced strategies and quick reflexes. Defeat them to advance and discover new rewards and secrets.



🔄 Progression and Upgrades:

Unlock a variety of upgrades, classes, maps, weapons, and abilities along your journey. Each choice shapes your ninja monkey's build, allowing unique combinations and personalized gameplay.



🗺️ Game Modes:

Explore different maps, each with its own challenges and environments. Face 100 rounds on each map, increasing difficulty and enemy diversity as you progress.



🤸‍♂️ Platforming Skills:

With automatic attacks, focus on mastering platforming skills and avoiding deadly hazards. Jump, run, and dodge to survive the chaos of the bees.



🎮 Addictive Gameplay:

With smooth and addictive gameplay mechanics, "Ninja Monkey" offers an exciting and rewarding experience for all types of players. Enhance your skills, customize your build, and fight to become the ultimate ninja monkey.

Get Ready for Battle:


"Ninja Monkey" is more than a platformer—it's a test of your strategic skills and quick reflexes. Are you ready for the challenge? Join the fight, defeat swarms of bees, and prove your worth as the most powerful ninja monkey of all time!

Add to Your Wishlist Now!


Don't miss the chance to embark on this epic adventure. Add "Ninja Monkey" to your wishlist on Steam and be among the first to experience the electrifying action when the game launches!

legal_notice: All content included in "Ninja Monkey," such as text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, data compilations, and software, is the exclusive property of developer Ícaro Almeida and is protected by international copyright and intellectual property laws.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon) Example: Intel Core 2 Duo SU9400, Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support Example: Intel HD Graphics 2500 (Ivy Bridge), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2020
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more Example: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full OpenGL 4.6 support Example: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (Kepler), AMD Radeon HD 7750 (GCN 1.0)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13
  • Processor: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon) Example: Intel Core 2 Duo SU9400, Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support Example: Intel HD Graphics 2500 (Ivy Bridge), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more Example: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full OpenGL 4.6 support Example: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (Kepler), AMD Radeon HD 7750 (GCN 1.0)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Ninja Monkey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU Example: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support Example: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more Example: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support Example: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Battle waves of bees, choose upgrades each round, and defeat challenging bosses. Unlock new classes, maps, weapons, and abilities while refining your build and mastering platforming skills!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese
